axioms.name: The Incoherence Principle
axioms.statement: I don't know why people expect art to make sense. They accept the fact that life doesn't make sense.
derivations: Narrative logic need not map to waking-life causality
The demand for 'sense' is itself a category error imposed on art
Art coherence requirement is false if life structure is incoherent and art reflects life

axioms.name: Ideas as Autonomous Entities
axioms.statement: The idea is the whole thing. If you stay true to the idea, it tells you everything you need to know.
derivations: Ideas originate from external source (ether/unified field), not the mind
Fidelity to original form is required
The artist's role is reception and faithful transmission, not construction or invention
Creative process involves catching ideas from depth through meditation
Deviation from the idea's original feeling must be rejected

axioms.name: Mood Primacy Over Plot
axioms.statement: My approach to film stems from my art background, as I go beyond the story to the sub-conscious mood created by sound and images.
derivations: Narrative hierarchy: mood/atmosphere > feeling/intuition > image/sound > character > plot/causality
Scene acceptance based on target mood match, not plot coherence
Plot-logical scenes may be rejected if mood is wrong

axioms.name: The Power of Secrets
axioms.statement: The magic of the discovery is ruined and the film experience, the secret, is killed.
derivations: Power is inversely proportional to explanation
Secrets kept from self enhance power

levels.name: Mood/Atmosphere
levels.description: The primary narrative content; atmosphere as structural element rather than decoration

levels.name: Feeling/Intuition
levels.description: Emotional truth that guides all creative decisions through feel-think navigation

levels.name: Image/Sound
levels.description: Visual and audio elements designed to deliver target feeling

levels.name: Character
levels.description: Characters exist to embody and enact the mood and feeling

levels.name: Plot/Causality
levels.description: Lowest priority; events exist to maintain feeling, not logical sequence

core_algorithms.name: Dream Logic Architecture
core_algorithms.purpose: Implement dream mechanics as narrative grammar through feeling-based causality
core_algorithms.pseudocode: FUNCTION apply_dream_logic(element): SEVER causal_chain; core_feeling = extract_emotional_content(element); transformed = dream_transform(element) APPLYING temporal_collapse, identity_fluidity, symbolic_literalization WHILE MAINTAINING core_feeling; IF transformed.emotional_resonance == core_feeling THEN ACCEPT ELSE RETRY; RETURN transformed

core_algorithms.name: Duality/Doubling System
core_algorithms.purpose: Create doubles to reveal truth that single identity conceals
core_algorithms.pseudocode: FUNCTION create_double(character, purpose): IF purpose == ESCAPE_TRAUMA THEN type = SPLIT_SELF; ELIF purpose == EXPLORE_DESIRE THEN type = MIRROR_DOUBLE; ELIF purpose == EXTERNALIZE_EVIL THEN type = SHADOW_POSSESSION; CREATE double WITH same_actor, different_name, inverted_characteristics, fragmented_shared_memories; IF photograph.contains(both_versions) THEN reality FRACTURES; RETURN double

core_algorithms.name: Mobius Strip Narrative
core_algorithms.purpose: Construct infinite loop narrative where ending returns to beginning
core_algorithms.pseudocode: FUNCTION construct_mobius(narrative): SEGMENT_1 = fantasy/wish with idealized_protagonist; TRANSITION via key_object (blue_box/cabin); SEGMENT_2 = reality/nightmare with damaged_protagonist; RECURSIVE_RETURN loops ending to opening; S1 = INVERSE(S2); S1 + S2 = complete_truth; RETURN mobius_narrative

core_algorithms.name: Tonal Rupture System
core_algorithms.purpose: Create meaning through sincere juxtaposition of incompatible tones
core_algorithms.pseudocode: FUNCTION create_sincere_uncanny(scene): surface_tone = WARMTH/NOSTALGIA/BEAUTY; subsurface_tone = DREAD/VIOLENCE/CORRUPTION; final_tone = HOLD_BOTH(surface, subsurface) SINCERELY; relationship = MUTUAL_INTENSIFICATION; RETURN scene.uncanny_sincere

core_algorithms.name: Mood Primacy System
core_algorithms.purpose: Construct sequences where narrative exists to deliver mood, not vice versa
core_algorithms.pseudocode: FUNCTION construct_sequence(target_mood): feeling = DEFINE(target_mood); sound = CREATE_SOUNDSCAPE(feeling); image = CREATE_VISUAL(feeling); events = WHATEVER_MAINTAINS(feeling); RETURN sequence.delivers(target_mood)

core_algorithms.name: Symbolic Recurrence
core_algorithms.purpose: Deploy consistent symbolic vocabulary that accrues meaning across works
core_algorithms.pseudocode: FUNCTION deploy_symbol(symbol, context): meaning = SYMBOL_LEXICON[symbol].meaning; IF viewer.previous_lynch_exposure THEN resonance = AMPLIFIED AND meaning += accumulated_associations; viewer.conscious_understanding = NOT_REQUIRED; viewer.felt_meaning = TRUE; RETURN symbol.deployed_with(meaning)

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work prioritize mood/atmosphere over plot coherence?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Mood is the primary narrative content; plot serves mood

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work maintain fidelity to the original idea's feeling?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: All elements tested against whether they match the target feeling

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work preserve mystery by withholding explanation?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Explanation density is low; interpretation space is maximum

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work employ dream logic (emotional causality rather than logical sequence)?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Connections based on emotional resonance, not waking-life causality

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work use doubling/duality to reveal concealed truth?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Split selves, mirror doubles, or doppelgangers expose what single identity hides

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work sincerely hold contradictory tones simultaneously?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Horror and beauty, innocence and corruption coexist without ironic distance

diagnostic_questions.question: Does the work deploy a consistent symbolic vocabulary?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Recurring symbols (red curtains, electricity, thresholds) carry accumulated meaning

diagnostic_questions.question: Does time operate non-linearly (simultaneity, loops, collapse)?
diagnostic_questions.valid_if: Past/present/future exist simultaneously; Mobius structure possible

maps_to: Tarkovsky: Dream and Memory (shared: dreams as valid reality, non-linear time, actor multiplicity, image as thought)
Surrealist Cinema Tradition (Breton, Dali, Bunuel): access unconscious, reject rationality, automatic creation
Bunuel: symbolic literalization, dream logic narrative, sexuality and violence fused
Freudian/Jungian Unconscious: collective/personal unconscious, nightmare as valid as dream
Transcendental Meditation: technique for accessing unconscious material

core_operations: Catch ideas from depth through meditation (not construct them)
Apply dream logic: emotional causality, temporal collapse, identity fluidity, symbolic literalization
Create doubles based on narrative purpose (trauma escape, desire exploration, evil externalization)
Construct Mobius strip narratives (ending loops to beginning)
Deploy tonal ruptures (sincere juxtaposition of horror/beauty)
Test all elements against original feeling
Use feel-think navigation for creative decisions
key_constraints: Never prioritize plot coherence over mood
Maintain fidelity to original idea feeling
Both light and dark must be sincere (not ironic)
Symbols must recur to accumulate meaning
Dream logic must maintain emotional truth as constant
Doubling must reveal what single identity conceals
Threshold spaces must operate with different time/communication rules

electricity.function: medium through which lodge spirits enter mundane world

coffee.function: connection to normal world; ritual against darkness

signature_patterns.name: The Threshold Moment
signature_patterns.structure: ordinary -> discovery -> entry to other world

signature_patterns.name: The Impossible Phone Call
examples: Mystery Man calling from your house

signature_patterns.name: The Performance That Tells Truth
examples: Rebekah Del Rio at Club Silencio

signature_patterns.name: The Cryptic Warning
examples: The owls are not what they seem
